description:
Encrypted Media: Add config change support in DecryptingAudioDecoder.

BUG=168128,168129
TEST=Added unittests; demo page works.

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=175300

messages.text: This CL is a clone of the DVD change (11745026). PTAL!
